text: @SenSchumer There cannot be another #coronavirus  bill passed that doesn't completely address the need for #VoteByMail in EVERY STATE. We see what happened in Wisconsin & know  SCOTUS won't do sh*t to #ProtectOurVotes. This must be non-negotiable! #HandMarkedPaperBallots #GOPBetrayedAmerica
